section1.title: Adcos Project Weatherseal Sealant N
section1.content: Adcos Project Weatherseal Sealant N is a one component general purpose neutral cure silicone sealant. It has good weatherability properties and adhere to most substrates including wood, glass, aluminium, UPVC, mortar, steel, etc.
features: Various glass construction for windows and doors
Cures to a tough, flexible rubber
application: Window frame (glass, aluminium, steel, wood, etc)

section2.title: Adcos Project - NS
section2.content: Adcos Project - NS is a premium Non Staining, one-component neutral cure silicone sealant with excellent resistance to extreme weather conditions in tropical climates. It is also commonly used as expansion joints in constructions and perimeter joints in high-rise buildings.
features: Weatherability - resistant to ozone, UV radiations and extreme weather
